constituent: fee, rice, measuring cup, big dipper, The Plough, drop, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: When buying rice, the fee is calculated by the cup. Naturally we don´t just use any cup; it has to be a proper measuring cup.
koohiiStory2: Samurai(s) once received their fee in the form of rice that had been carefully weighed in a measuring cup beforehand.
